data.name: ReadCase1
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS, STATUS_DATE, CSE_OPEN_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCase2
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS, STATUS_DATE, CSE_OPEN_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseRole
data.value: select top(1) CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, ON_SS_IND, HEALTH_INS_IND, MEDICAL_SUPP_IND, MOTHERS_FIRST_NM, MOTHERS_MID_INIT, FATHERS_LAST_NAME, FATHERS_MID_INIT, FATHERS_FIRST_NAME, MOTHER_MAIDEN_LAST, PARENT_TYPE, NOTIFIED_DATE, NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN, LIVING_WITH_AR_IND, NONPAYMENT_CAT, CONTACT_FIRST_NAME, CONTACT_MID_INIT, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_LAST_NAME, CHILD_CARE_EXPENSE, ASSIGNMENT_DATE, ASSIGNMENT_TERM_CD, ASSIGN_OF_RIGHTS, ASSIGNMENT_TERM_DT, ABSENCE_REASON_CD, BC_FATHERS_MI, BC_FATHER_FIRST_NM, PRIOR_MEDICAL_SUPP, BC_SIGNATURE, AR_WAIVED_INS, BC_FATHER_LAST_NM, OUT_OF_WEDLOCK, EMANCIPATION_DT, FC_ADOPT_DISRUPT, FC_AP_NOTIFIED, FC_CINC_IND, FC_COST_OF_CARE, FC_CARE_COST_FREQ, FC_COUNTY_REM_FROM, FC_INIT_CUSTODY_DT, FC_IN_HM_SERV_IND, FC_IV_E_CASE_NO, FC_JV_CRT_ORDER, FC_JV_OFFENDER_IND, FC_LEVEL_OF_CARE, FC_NEXT_JV_CT_DT, FC_ORDER_EST_BY, FC_OTHER_BEN_IND, FC_PARENTAL_RIGHTS, FC_PRV_PAY_FRST_NM, FC_PRV_PAY_MI, FC_PLACEMENT_DATE, FC_PLACEMENT_NAME, FC_PLACEMENT_RSN, FC_PREVIOUS_PA, FC_PRV_PAY_LAST_NM, FC_SRCE_OF_FUNDING, FC_SRS_PAYEE, FC_SSA, FC_SSI, FC_VA_IND, FC_WARDS_ACCOUNT, FC_ZEB_IND, IN_SCHOOL_OVER_18, PAT_ESTAB_IND, RESIDE_WITH_AR_IND, SPECIALTY_AREA, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, CONFIRMED_TYPE, REL_TO_AR, AR_CHG_PRC_REQ_IND, AR_CHG_PROC_DT, AR_INVALID_IND, NOTE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where (@casNumber = CAS_NUMBER) and (CASE_ROLE_ID = @caseRoleId)

data.name: ReadCaseRoleCsePerson
data.value: select CAS_NUMBER, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CASE_ROLE_ID, START_DATE, END_DATE, ON_SS_IND, HEALTH_INS_IND, MEDICAL_SUPP_IND, MOTHERS_FIRST_NM, MOTHERS_MID_INIT, FATHERS_LAST_NAME, FATHERS_MID_INIT, FATHERS_FIRST_NAME, MOTHER_MAIDEN_LAST, PARENT_TYPE, NOTIFIED_DATE, NUMBER_OF_CHILDREN, LIVING_WITH_AR_IND, NONPAYMENT_CAT, CONTACT_FIRST_NAME, CONTACT_MID_INIT, CONTACT_PHONE, CONTACT_LAST_NAME, CHILD_CARE_EXPENSE, ASSIGNMENT_DATE, ASSIGNMENT_TERM_CD, ASSIGN_OF_RIGHTS, ASSIGNMENT_TERM_DT, ABSENCE_REASON_CD, BC_FATHERS_MI, BC_FATHER_FIRST_NM, PRIOR_MEDICAL_SUPP, BC_SIGNATURE, AR_WAIVED_INS, BC_FATHER_LAST_NM, OUT_OF_WEDLOCK, EMANCIPATION_DT, FC_ADOPT_DISRUPT, FC_AP_NOTIFIED, FC_CINC_IND, FC_COST_OF_CARE, FC_CARE_COST_FREQ, FC_COUNTY_REM_FROM, FC_INIT_CUSTODY_DT, FC_IN_HM_SERV_IND, FC_IV_E_CASE_NO, FC_JV_CRT_ORDER, FC_JV_OFFENDER_IND, FC_LEVEL_OF_CARE, FC_NEXT_JV_CT_DT, FC_ORDER_EST_BY, FC_OTHER_BEN_IND, FC_PARENTAL_RIGHTS, FC_PRV_PAY_FRST_NM, FC_PRV_PAY_MI, FC_PLACEMENT_DATE, FC_PLACEMENT_NAME, FC_PLACEMENT_RSN, FC_PREVIOUS_PA, FC_PRV_PAY_LAST_NM, FC_SRCE_OF_FUNDING, FC_SRS_PAYEE, FC_SSA, FC_SSI, FC_VA_IND, FC_WARDS_ACCOUNT, FC_ZEB_IND, IN_SCHOOL_OVER_18, PAT_ESTAB_IND, RESIDE_WITH_AR_IND, SPECIALTY_AREA, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, CREATED_BY, CONFIRMED_TYPE, REL_TO_AR, AR_CHG_PRC_REQ_IND, AR_CHG_PROC_DT, AR_INVALID_IND, NOTE from CKT_CASE_ROLE where @casNumber = CAS_NUMBER

data.name: UpdateCase
data.value: update CKT_CASE set CSE_OPEN_DATE = @cseOpenDate, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy where NUMB = @numb
